DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Effects are activated only by being discarded through a Scry effect.
This card needs to be upgraded to unlock its effect.
This card is removed from your deck when played.
Use a detonator to deal this enemy damage equal to the rigged amount.
Use Release to deal damage to a random enemy equal to your inner demons.
Apply a random debuff to an enemy when dealing unblocked damage.
Apply a random buff to yourself when dealing unblocked damage.
When gaining block, gain a random buff.
Gain gold when dealing unblocked damage.
Orb: Increases Poison every turn. When Evoked, apply Poison to enemy with highest HP.
For every card you have played this turn, enemy takes 10% more damage from Attacks.
